descriptionHtml:
Thank you for seeing.
[img]http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/fakesalvia/imgs/f/3/f3370a86.png[/img]

[b][color=#6aa84f][size=4]ABOUT THIS MOD____
[/size][/color][/b]
This mod adds a new Standalone follower. You can find he [color=#f1c232]on Whiterun's Gate[/color].
He was made in the image of Dragonian. He is [color=#ea9999]marriageable[/color] and [color=#ea9999]essential[/color].

Name:[color=#ff0000][size=4] Iswid
[/size][/color]Sex: Male
Combat style: Monk
Level: min 10 to max 100
Magic: Healing
Perk: Light Foot, Silent Roll, Silence, Unhindered, Conditioning
[img]http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/fakesalvia/imgs/1/c/1c8fec19.png[/img]

[color=#6aa84f][size=4][b]Credit____

[/b][/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/981/?]Drachis Argonians[/url] Mod by Drachis
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58842/?]KS Hairdos Beast Races[/url] by KrittaKitty
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43833/?]Digitigrade Khajiit[/url] by artifex0
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28502/?]Edhildils Argonian War Tails[/url] by Edhildil

Thanks a lot!!

[color=#c27ba0][size=4][b]Recommend____
[/b][/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43833/?]
Digitigrade Khajiit
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50416/?]Unarmed Warfare - New Animations For Hand To Hand Combat
[/url]
